testcase.name: test_booking_response_includes_surge_info

failure.message: AssertionError: Booking should include surge info assert ('surge_days' in {'created_at': '2026-02-05T11:16:49.169614+00:00', 'duration_type': 'daily', 'end_date': '2026-02-09', 'hours': None, ...} or 'surge_percentage' in {'created_at': '2026-02-05T11:16:49.169614+00:00', 'duration_type': 'daily', 'end_date': '2026-02-09', 'hours': None, ...})

testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_surge_discounts.py:374: in test_booking_response_includes_surge_info assert "surge_days" in data or "surge_percentage" in data, "Booking should include surge info" E AssertionError: Booking should include surge info E assert ('surge_days' in {'created_at': '2026-02-05T11:16:49.169614+00:00', 'duration_type': 'daily', 'end_date': '2026-02-09', 'hours': None, ...} or 'surge_percentage' in {'created_at': '2026-02-05T11:16:49.169614+00:00', 'duration_type': 'daily', 'end_date': '2026-02-09', 'hours': None, ...})

testcase.name: test_booking_response_includes_discount_info

failure.message: AssertionError: Booking should include discount info assert ('discount_applied' in {'created_at': '2026-02-05T11:16:49.847353+00:00', 'duration_type': 'daily', 'end_date': '2026-03-14', 'hours': None, ...} or 'discount_label' in {'created_at': '2026-02-05T11:16:49.847353+00:00', 'duration_type': 'daily', 'end_date': '2026-03-14', 'hours': None, ...})

testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_surge_discounts.py:384: in test_booking_response_includes_discount_info assert "discount_applied" in data or "discount_label" in data, "Booking should include discount info" E AssertionError: Booking should include discount info E assert ('discount_applied' in {'created_at': '2026-02-05T11:16:49.847353+00:00', 'duration_type': 'daily', 'end_date': '2026-03-14', 'hours': None, ...} or 'discount_label' in {'created_at': '2026-02-05T11:16:49.847353+00:00', 'duration_type': 'daily', 'end_date': '2026-03-14', 'hours': None, ...})
